pages.text: 2|106|Amara kono ayata rahita karale ba bhuliye dile ta theke uttama athaba tara samana kono ayata ene de'i [1] apani ki janena na ye, allah‌ saba kichura upara ksamatabana.
2|107|Apani ki janena na ye, asamana o yaminera sarbabhaumatba ekamatra allah‌ra? Ara allah‌ chara tomadera kono abhibhabaka'o ne'i, ne'i sahayyakari'o.
2|108|Tomara ki tomadera rasulake serupa prasna karate ca'o yerupa prasna purbe musake kara hayechila [1]? Ara ye imanake kuphare paribartana karabe, se abasya'i sarala patha harala.

2|109|Kitabidera aneke'i caya, yadi tara tomaderake imana anara para kaphirarupe phiriye nite parata! Satya spasta ha'oyara para'o tadera nijedera paksa theke bidbesabasatah (tara eta kare thake). Ata'eba, tomara ksama kara ebam upeksa kara yataksana na allah‌ tara kono nirdesa dena [1] - niscaya'i allah‌ saba kichura upara ksamatabana.
2|110|Ara tomara salata pratistha kara o yakata da'o ebam tomara uttama kajera ya kichu nijedera jan'ya pesa karabe allah‌ra kache ta pabe. Niscaya tomara ya karacha allah‌ tara samyaka drasta.
2|111|Ara tara bale, ‘iyahudi athaba nasara chara an'ya ke'u kakhano jannate prabesa karabe na’ [1]. Eta tadera mithya asa. Baluna, ‘yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o tabe tomadera pramana pesa kara’.
2|112|Hyam, ye ke'u allah‌ra kache sampurnarupe atmasamarpana kare ebam satkarmasila haya [1] tara pratidana tara rabera kache rayeche. Ara tadera kono bhaya ne'i ebam tara cintita'o habe na.
